Name: The Face
Description: Gain Stamina Regen when near 3+ Allies.

Name: Lone Wolf
Description: Gain +10% Crit and Stealth when alone.

Name: Observer
Description: See exact stats/durability numbers on items.

Name: Visionary
Description: Vague hunches appear on your map for unsolved quests.

Name: Cold Logic
Description: Immune to NPC emotional manipulation/begging.

Name: Empath
Description: Action: Heal ally Sanity by talking.

Name: Planner
Description: First attack in combat deals +50% dmg if you strike first.

Name: Improviser
Description: Gain speed/dmg boost when equipment breaks or plan fails.

Name: Bloodletter
Description: Heal 1% of dmg dealt. Title: 'Bloodletter'.

Name: Stubborn Mule
Description: Gain temporary Willpower stacking on failed checks.

Name: Heartthrob
Description: Action: Distract guards with charm.

Name: Ranger of the Wild
Description: Call a temporary wolf ally in forests.

Name: Street Hustler
Description: Access Black Market menu from any alleyway.

Name: Walking Disaster
Description: Traps you trigger damage enemies instead.

Name: Iron Liver
Description: Unlocks unique 'Drunken' fighting style moves.

Name: Blue Blood
Description: Guards salute. Access to Noble district parties.

Name: Vampiric Nature
Description: Buffed stats at night, debuffed in day.

Name: Pack Rat
Description: Can sprint-tackle enemies using your weight.

Name: Godslayer
Description: Can mount boss heads on belt to fear enemies.

Name: Pacifist
Description: Create a zone where violence is disabled.

Name: Void Touched
Description: The Void whispers secrets (hints) to you.

Name: Monk
Description: Unarmed attacks project force (Range increase).

Name: Gravity Defier
Description: Can wall-run for short distances.
